author: husted
msg: CheckStyle pass
* Low-risk, mechanical changes only.
* Mostly Javadocs.
* Some IDE-assisted code changes, such as renaming final fields or removing unused private fields
NOTES
* ActionServlet - We are throwing from a Finally block
* RequestProcessor - We are syncronizing on a non-final field
STATUS
* We're down to 1882 errors in the Action subproject.
* I'm though the outer Action package, outer Chain, and Chain.Commands. Next would be Chain.Context.
* I'll be out most of the day, but I can work on this some more tonight.
